import './Navbar.css' import React, { useState } from 'react'; // Removed useEffect because it's not being used import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar = () => { const [selectedGenre, setSelectedGenre] = useState(''); const genres = ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Fantasy', 'Comedy', 'Horror', 'Romance', 'Drama', 'SCI-FI', 'Western', 'Mystery', 'Comic Book', 'Animation']; const handleGenreChange = (genre) => { setSelectedGenre(genre); }; const fetchMovies = async (genre) => { const response = await axios.get(`/Genre/${genre}`); console.log(genre); // Handle response to display movies on the genre page }; return (
